titleStmt.title: The French king's new declaration, in favour of the troopers, dragoons and soldiers, that having deserted his majesties forces before the first of January last, shall come and list themselves again, and serve for six years successively.
titleStmt.author: Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.
France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV).

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
